name: Jagabandhu Jarashram
briefDescription: The Mission of the organization is to assure socioeconomic justice to the underprivileged sections of the society through different developmental activities. To bring about a qualitative change of these people in particular, PRAYAS strives to assure health, education and livelihood for all. PRAYAS strives to act as a catalyst for better community organization, resource mobilization, idea initiation and capacity building of the community at the grass roots level.
